ygData.subject: RE: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, this is not at *all* my experience and we spent a few hours hunting in there last night.  That place is creepy as hell, especially if you are watching
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, this is not at *all* my experience and we spent a few hours hunting in
there last night. That place is creepy as hell, especially if you are
watching Blair Witch Project while you are there! This place DEFINITELY
adds atmosphere now and provides an outdoor zone for groups 30 to 50.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Gahk! Have you been in Kith since the patch??? They have totally NERFED
> it!
>
> It nearly completely light in there! WTF? Man I needed some
> spell to cloud
> my vision! Granted I do got my clipping plane set to max
> viewing distance
> but come on now - this is ridiculous!
>
> Ugh - ugh - ugh what are they doing??
>
> It used to be one of the most totally scary zones we had. Even if there
> were no really bad mobs in there (after level 20/25 when ghouls
> go green) it
> was still scary - dark, foggy, ucky noises and all.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> Bard of the 35th song <yes still - hell hell hell>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
